George West Municipal Court Online Payments

Pay Here

Court Docket

If you have any questions regarding your citation you may contact the court ON or BEFORE the plea date specified on your citation. You may contact the court in writing, in person, or by attorney. Please note a Phone call does not constitute an appearance. You cannot Plea your case via telephone. For payment plan or extension options, please call the court BEFORE the plea date on your citation.

PERSONAL CHECKS ARE NOT ACCEPTED!

MAKE MONEY ORDERS PAYABLE TO THE “CITY OF GEORGE WEST”

 Schedule of Acceptable Fines & Dismissals

ALL FINAL DISPOSITIONS OF FINES ARE LEFT TO THE DISCRETION OF THE JUDGE SPEEDING: Examine your citation & locate ALLEGED SPEED AND SPEED LIMIT

 NON-SCHOOL ZONE

1-10 mph over the speed limit…… $174.90
11 mph over the speed limit………. $178.90
12 mph over the speed limit………. $182.90
13 mph over the speed limit………. $186.90
14 mph over the speed limit………. $190.90
15 mph over the speed limit………. $194.90
16 mph over the speed limit………. $198.90
17 mph over the speed limit………. $202.90
18 mph over the speed limit………. $206.90
19 mph over the speed limit………. $210.90
20 mph over the speed limit………. $214.90
21 mph over the speed limit………. $218.90
22 mph over the speed limit………. $222.90
23 mph over the speed limit………. $226.90
24 mph over the speed limit………. $230.90
25 mph and over the speed limit… $238.90

SCHOOL ZONE

1-10 mph over the speed limit…… $209.90
11 mph over the speed limit………. $214.90
12 mph over the speed limit………. $219.90
13 mph over the speed limit………. $224.90
14 mph over the speed limit………. $229.90
15 mph over the speed limit………. $234.90
16 mph over the speed limit………. $239.90
17 mph over the speed limit………. $244.90
18 mph over the speed limit………. $249.90
19 mph over the speed limit………. $254.90
20 mph over the speed limit………. $259.90
21 mph over the speed limit………. $264.90
22 mph over the speed limit………. $269.90
23 mph over the speed limit………. $274.90
24 mph over the speed limit………. $249.90
25 mph and over the speed limit… $289.90

*CDL HOLDERS: Speeding 15 miles or above over the speed limit- fine is automatically set at $300.00

*Speeding (Construction zone if workers are present) $180.00 for 1st 10 mph over speed limit ($8.00 for each mile over the speed limit.)

*Citation for PASSING SCHOOL BUS (YOU DO NOT QUALIFY FOR DSC OR DEFERRED)- Fine is automatically set at $300.00)

Juveniles (16yrs old or younger must appear with one or both parents to enter plea), If you fail to respond to charge by the appearance date, a charge of failure to appear may be assessed against you and may result in suspension of your driver’s license.
